par1: To reduce our greenhouse gas emissions. This can be achieved by transitioning to renewable energy, improving energy efficiency, and reducing our consumption of fossil fuels.
par2: Assist communities in adapting to the effects of climate change. This includes building levees and dams to protect coastal areas from floods, planting trees to mitigate the effects of drought, and developing new varieties of crops resistant to heat.
par3: Invest in research and development of new technologies. This includes developing new renewable energy sources, carbon capture and storage technologies, and technologies to mitigate the effects of ongoing climate change.
